NK103(pe)024:1: // byang chub kyi sems nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhugs /
NK103(pe)024:3: bo d+d+hi tsit+ta rat+na sur+ya gar+b+ha pra b+ha ba n+aa ma /
NK103(pe)024:5: byang gzhi chub kyi sems rin lam po che nyi
NK103(pe)024:6: ma'i 'bras bu snying po 'od zer dang ldan pa
NK103(pe)024:7: zhes bya ba // bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK103(pe)024:8: chos nyid ma nor ba byang chub kyi sems rang
NK103(pe)024:9: chas su gnas kyang rtogs pa'i rkyen bzhi dang bral
NK103(pe)024:10: bas // dper na mig gis mig ma mthong ba bzhin du yul du ma grub pas /
NK103(pe)024:11: ma lhan rig gzhan du brtags kun pas las dang las kyi 'bras bur 'khrul //
NK103(pe)024:12: man ngag rin chen rgyal ba rig 'dzin gang zag
NK103(pe)024:13: tu brgyud pas byang chub sems rig nas de'i ngang
NK103(pe)024:14: du goms pas gnas lugs dang mthun par spyad pa'i
NK103(pe)024:15: mthus // rang gnas kyi sar smin pa chos sku
NK103(pe)024:16: longs spyod dang sprul pas gdul bya 'dren pa thob
NK103(pe)024:18: dmigs 0 par bya ba smin 0 par byed pa mthar 0 phyin pa ni //
NK103(pe)024:19: yul 0 gzhi rkyen lam 'bras 0 bur brda yis zhen pas mtshon pa ni //
NK103(pe)024:20: byang 0 chub kyi sems rin chen nyi 0 chos 'od longs gzer sprul //
NK103(pe)024:21: yi dam mi bskyod pa dang bla mas gnod sbyin
NK103(pe)024:22: mo lung bstan nas man ngag rtsom pa'i lus rnam
NK103(pe)024:23: gzhag byas so // chos yang na tshogs brgyad thams
NK103(pe)024:24: cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems su gnas
NK103(pe)024:25: gzhag byas so // te // tshogs drug gi yul
NK103(pe)024:26: ril gcod par byed cing yul thun mong ngam khyad
NK103(pe)024:27: par ram 'das ma 'ongs gnyis phyi sgo lnga dang
NK103(pe)024:28: nang nyon yid rang rgyud snga ma gsum gyi rjes
NK103(pe)024:29: su 'brangs pa'i spros pa sna tshogs rnams //
NK103(pe)024:30: rang bzhin nam ngang gis mi gnas te spros pa dang bral bas byang //
NK103(pe)024:31: dbang po gzugs can la rten pa'i rnam shes lnga rang bzhin gyis mi 'gag par shar ba'i //
NK103(pe)024:32: yul snang la mi 'dzin pa sgyu ma'i rnam par khyab pas chub //
NK103(pe)024:33: kha nang du kun gzhi la bltas nas ngar 'dzin pa de'i mtshan nyid ji lta bar //
NK103(pe)024:34: rtogs na mtshan nyid rang rig gnyug ma'i sems //
NK103(pe)024:35: spros pa mi gnas rang bzhin rol pa mi rnam pa 'gag yul shes dbyer med mtshan nyid gsum //
NK103(pe)024:36: med pa yod pa dbyer med kyi phyogs su ma
NK103(pe)024:37: lhungs yin don du ro gcig pa ni gzhi don
NK103(pe)024:38: gyi // kun gzhi ma bcos byang chub sems so //
NK103(pe)024:39: de nyid ma rtogs shing phyin ci log tu brtags pas bag chags rnyog pa'i gzhi //
NK103(pe)024:41: dmigs pa dang yul shes shing 'dzin pa'i rnam pa rgya yongs su ma chad par //
NK103(pe)024:42: don phyi snod gnas dang nang len pa'i sems can
NK103(pe)024:43: rig go bdag rig pa nyon yid yul rnam par
NK103(pe)024:44: rig pa dang tshogs drug dang bdun snang ste de
NK103(pe)024:46: lnga la mtshan mar bcad yid gcig la phyi nang bar gsum gsal te gsum ka'i rjes su 'brangs //
NK103(pe)024:47: drug gis sa bon gang sad pa'i 'bras bur smin //
NK103(pe)024:50: las kyi 'khor ba lci gang dang //
NK103(pe)024:51: nye ba gang dang goms pa dang //
NK103(pe)024:52: sngon byas gang yin de las ni //
NK103(pe)024:53: snga ma snga ma rnam smin 'gyur //
NK103(pe)024:55: 'khrul pa'i sems rang gis rang bcings nas sdug pa'o //
NK103(pe)024:56: des na rin chen brgyud pa gces //
NK103(pe)024:57: dmigs yul byang chub sems su /
NK103(pe)024:58: gnas pa la smin bar byed pa'i rkyen rin chen ni //
NK103(pe)024:59: rgyu gcig rkyen gnyis yid ches gsum //
NK103(pe)024:60: gnas pa bzhi dang grogs rnam lnga'o //
NK103(pe)024:61: dmigs pa'i yul sngar bshad pa'i gnas lugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu ni //
NK103(pe)024:62: mu bzhi phyogs rer 'dzin pa'i skyon bzhi las grol
NK103(pe)024:63: ba ni dper na rin chen la bsod nams dang
NK103(pe)024:65: lung dang man ngag gnyis tshad mar gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)024:66: rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse la btags nas
NK103(pe)024:67: mchod pas dgos pa 'byung ba ltar rtogs pa'i grogs
NK103(pe)024:68: sam rkyen no // thos pas lung gi chos la yid ches nas //
NK103(pe)024:69: der 'thad pas ming du btags pa de tshig tu zin //
NK103(pe)024:70: bsam pas tshig dang don gnyis 'brel te don spyi tsam rtogs //
NK103(pe)024:71: man ngag dang lung bsdebs pas don dang 'brel bar yid ches //
NK103(pe)024:72: brda bral rang grol ba'i man ngag mngon sum du grub pas //
NK103(pe)024:73: chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid tshad ma gsum dang
NK103(pe)024:74: mi 'gal bar yid ches thag chod nges pa rnyed
NK103(pe)024:75: do // de ltar nges par rtogs kyang res gnas te snang res mi gnas te bral bar snang //
NK103(pe)024:76: dang po'i las can gyis brtson pas bstun te sgom ma byung bar du gnas pa la 'bad //
NK103(pe)024:77: dran pa'i rkyen dang ldan pas yid mi g.yo bar gnas pa la //
NK103(pe)024:78: rtsol ba klod cing ma bcos lhug par gzhag /
NK103(pe)024:79: der ni shes bya thams cad thig le nyag gcig tu rgya gcad la 'das //
NK103(pe)024:80: mthon 'khor dman byang chub snying po'i klong chen por mnyam par gnas so //
NK103(pe)024:81: dran pa la sogs pa gsal byed kyi rkyen la ma rag par brtan //
NK103(pe)024:82: yid don la mnyam par gnas te rtsol ba dang
NK103(pe)024:83: bral bar ye shes lhun gyis grub ste lhug par
NK103(pe)024:85: nyams de bzhi gang zag rgyu tha dad yi rim pa bzhir skye ba'am //
NK103(pe)024:86: gang zag gcig la nyams brtan pa'i kyi rim par skye pa'i tshul lo //
NK103(pe)024:87: 'tsho srog bsam gtan gyi bar chod gsum dang bral
NK103(pe)024:88: ba'i rten gnas bzang po chu shing mod la 'chags
NK103(pe)024:89: bde ba ni // nyams bde rig pa gar bskyongs pa ni gnas kyi grogs dang //
NK103(pe)024:90: zas gos la sogs mkho ba'i yo byad che chung ran par ldan //
NK103(pe)024:91: pa ni las dang po pa'i lus dang yid bde ba dang ldan pa'i grogs so //
NK103(pe)024:92: lung chos zab mo dang bla ma'am sgom nyams can gyi spun 0ni //
NK103(pe)024:93: zhor kha snang 'khrul pa'i 'phrang sol cing yin don nges par 'char ba'i grogs so //
NK103(pe)024:94: rnal 'byor pa la mos ka gus brtan ldan rang yid 'thad pa'i gzungs ma ni //
NK103(pe)024:95: khams 0 lus gso bying ba gseng skyo ba sel rig pa skyong ba'i grogs so //
NK103(pe)024:96: rang ganyid gzhi dad pa grogs brtson 'grus brtser gdung dam tshig dang ldan pa'i //
NK103(pe)024:97: chu bo bzhi'i rgyun dang ldan pa ni rtsa ba'i grogs dang lnga'o //
NK103(pe)024:99: gnas lugs ji lta bar sgrib byed dang bral bar mthar phyin pa nyid chos kyi sku ste //
NK103(pe)024:100: rang byung gi ye shes rang gsal cir yang mi rtog snying por shar ba'o //
NK103(pe)024:101: chos thams cad bde chen du mnga' mdzad pas nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
NK103(pe)024:102: sar smin pa rig 'dzin byang chub sems pa'i 'khor la 'od skur shar bas gzhan longs sku //
NK103(pe)024:103: mos pas spyod na dang po'i tshe //
NK103(pe)024:104: thugs rje sprul pa'i gzer gyis 'dren pa sprul pa'i sku'o //
NK103(pe)024:105: yin lugs kyi ngang la sku gsum tha dad mi gnas pas //
NK103(pe)024:106: snying po dang 'od dang gzer dang gsum po nyid mthun no //
NK103(pe)024:107: kye ho skyes bu sbyangs pa can //
NK103(pe)024:108: rang sor gzhag pas rnal ma'i don la gnas par 'dod na //
NK103(pe)024:109: lhun grub rin chen gling nas rtogs pa sbyin gyi nor bu long zhig /
NK103(pe)024:110: de med na gzhan dbul ba sel nus pa 'ga' yang yod dam ste med pa des na //
NK103(pe)024:111: rig pa thams cad du rgyu rkyen med par rang
NK103(pe)024:112: gsal lta ba 'khor 'das mnyam nyid ngang la phyogs
NK103(pe)024:113: ris spyod pa med pas blta bya lta byed med
NK103(pe)024:114: par ltos // sgom pa ma don nor ba'i ngang
NK103(pe)024:115: la gnas pas bcos su med de yin don rang
NK103(pe)024:117: don la gnas pa'i sgo gsum ma bcings par bag yangs su spyod //
NK103(pe)024:118: phyogs ris las grol ba'i rtogs pa de shin tu
NK103(pe)024:119: mdzes pas rgyan 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ngang la
NK103(pe)024:120: kun brten pas lus tshig rjes ma gcod par lhun
NK103(pe)024:122: rang bzhin 1 mtshan 2 nyid rnam pa 3 gsum ma nor bar bzhugs kyang //
NK103(pe)024:123: de ma rtogs te yid 1 spros pa sna tshogs
NK103(pe)024:124: su 'phros nyon yid kyis nyon 2 mongs sgo lngas
NK103(pe)024:125: yul 3lngar gcad // dpa' mo gnod sbyin mos spros
NK103(pe)024:126: 1 bral rang 2 rig sgyu 3mar thug phrad du
NK103(pe)024:127: yul 3lngar gcad // bstan pa // de mtshon par
NK103(pe)024:128: byed pa 'di byas pa'i dge ba 'gro kun lhun
NK103(pe)024:129: gnas kyi don 'dir gnas par smon //
NK103(pe)024:130: drin tshig brjod pa e ma ho re bde ri khrod ma /
NK103(pe)024:131: dpal ldan rnal 'byor mas ku ku r+aa dza bdag byin gyis brlabs //
NK103(pe)024:132: rigs mnyam grol dang mthun pa'i rtogs goms kyi las spyod pas //
NK103(pe)024:133: rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis med las 'phags te don lhun gnas su grol bar byas pa drin che'o //
NK103(pe)024:134: kye ho dpal ldan seng ge 'od can rigs kyi bu khyod //
NK103(pe)024:135: mkhas pas phyogs med kyi don la mi 'khyar bar bya'i //
NK103(pe)024:136: tha snyad tshig gi rjes su ma 'brang zhig rtogs pa mi skyong bar /
NK103(pe)024:137: don med tshig tha snyad snyan pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba min gyi //
NK103(pe)024:138: 'o na yang don mtshon par byed pa'i tshig lam ma dgag cig /
NK103(pe)024:139: rtogs pa'i don la gnas sam ngang la gnas nas rtogs par bya'i //
NK103(pe)024:140: zhi gnas nyams la ma zhen cig /
NK103(pe)024:141: ma rtogs pa'i nyams la zhen pa'i gtad 'dzin spang gi //
NK103(pe)024:142: dngos grub goms pa'i chu rgyun ting nge 'dzin ma bcad cig /
NK103(pe)024:143: don 'gyur lhag spyod btsun par bya'i //
NK103(pe)024:144: btsun pa'i dregs pa dang mi btsun pa gzhan la brnyas pa ma byed cig /
NK103(pe)024:145: rang don sgrub pa'i 'jur bus bsdam pa ni spang gi //
NK103(pe)024:146: dkar nag rgyu 'bras 'dra mod ces ma zlog cig /
NK103(pe)024:147: yod med gnyis gnyis med kyi mtha' bzhir phyogs lhung dgrol bar bya //
NK103(pe)024:148: rtogs par byed pa'i thabs mu bzhi ma dgag cig /
NK103(pe)024:149: mu bzhi po de rang lde mig dang 'dra bar gcig gis gcig rang grol bar bya'i //
NK103(pe)024:150: 'bros pa bde ba'i phyir kha 'byam du ma smra zhig /
NK103(pe)024:151: nges par rtogs goms gdeng du phebs par bya //
NK103(pe)024:152: mi shes shes tshul byas nas rang bslu bar ma byed cig /
NK103(pe)024:153: slob dpon dge slong ku ku r+aa dzas mdzad pa'i /
NK103(pe)024:154: byang chub kyi sems nyi ma'i snying po 'od gzer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba /
NK103(pe)024:156: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ta dang /
NK103(pe)024:157: zhu chen gyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro
NK103(pe)024:158: tsa nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur
NK103(pe)024:159: cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////tshig rkang brgya 1rtsa
NK103(pe)024:160: dang rkang pa gnyis 1dang ldan te des na /
NK103(pe)024:161: sh+lo nyi shu phyed dang rtsa drug 1ste /
NK103(pe)024:162: don 111gsum dang ldan pas gzhung 'di 'i tshad do //
